Description: Template for AWS data ingest into Splunk using AWS Kinesis Firehose and AWS Lambda.

SplunkUsername.Description: The Splunk user that will be used by the template to configure HEC for Trumpet. This user should have permission to list and create HEC tokens.

SplunkPassword.Description: The Splunk password for the provided user.

Properties.Description: Stream events from an AWS S3 bucket being updated by AWS config to Splunk using HTTP event collector

detail-type: AWS Console Sign In via CloudTrail

Properties.Description: Stream events from CloudWatch Events to Splunk using HTTP event collector
Stream events from CLoudWatch Logs to Splunk using HTTP event collector
Stream events from VPC Flow Logs to Splunk using HTTP event collector
